mainEntity.name: How much does pallet racking cost?

acceptedAnswer.text: Pallet racking costs typically range from $50-$200 per pallet position for new systems, depending on height, weight capacity, and configuration. Used rack can save 40-60% compared to new. Contact Rack Storage Solutions for a customized quote based on your specific needs.

mainEntity.name: How long does pallet rack installation take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Installation timeline depends on project size. A typical 100-position system takes 1-2 days. Larger warehouse installations of 500+ positions may take 1-2 weeks. Rack Storage Solutions provides detailed timelines in every quote.
